storyInfo: Lemuen picks up her gun. The sharp blade of the past cuts through the gentile facade.

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: You're accusing me?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: That's not what I meant...
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: What about you? Are you going to accuse me too?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Come now, Raimund, no one's making any accusations...
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: I didn't start any fires.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Then why are you here at this hour?
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: You don't pray with us. You don't come to the sacrarium. You... you people don't have any faith!
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: We may not have faith. But that doesn't mean we have anything to do with the fire.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I had some personal business that took me past this place. Believe me or don't.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: What sort of business?
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: Nothing to do with you.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Hey...!
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: Enough. Is there some rule against us being here? You just want to accuse us of starting the fire, don't you?
attributes.name: Fernand

attributes.content: We shouldn't have helped them fight the fire. We should have let the place burn to the ground.
attributes.name: Fernand

attributes.content: What did you say?!
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: Fires have happened before, at this time of year. It could just be a coincidence.
attributes.name: Calm Inhabitant

attributes.content: What a coincidence it would be! You there, didn't you say someone started the fire? Come here...
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: Yes, I believe this was an intentional act.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: And you think I did it?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: No, I don't.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You're lying.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I have no reason to lie.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The fire spread quickly. It can be inferred that the arsonist was near the sacrarium.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: And Raimund was—
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: Do not jump to conclusions. What I meant was that anyone who was near the scene is a suspect.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: That includes all of you, and myself.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Wh-What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: You think we started the fire? We're Sankta. Why would we burn our own sacrarium?
attributes.name: Calm Inhabitant

attributes.content: Race is not proof of innocence. I would not hesitate to destroy the sacrarium, if I thought it necessary.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I did not find any evidence implicating this Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Hmph, at least you're talking sense.
attributes.name: Fernand

attributes.content: Senior Federico is right... we can't accuse anybody without evidence.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: You're gonna just let this go?! It's the sacrarium! And all those flowers that you so painstakingly grew...
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: Please, that's enough!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I don't want to suspect any of us.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Clément...
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: The arguing must stop.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The possibility of the Sankta burning their own sacrarium cannot be eliminated. I will continue to investigate until I discover the true culprit.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Hey, wing-man, about what just happened...
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You're the one who started all that, alright? You're the one who first said that someone started the fire!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: And you don't fully trust me, do you?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Can you give me a little more than that?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Ahem. Anyway, what I mean is...
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: ...Don't expect me to thank you.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I don't.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: (He doesn't know how to say gratias, Sara.)
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: (Poor thing...)
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: (We can teach him! It's not hard.)
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: (But I'm a little scared of him...)
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Who are you saying doesn't know how to say gratias?!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Hey, wing-man! Where did these kids come from? I've never seen them before!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Eek!
attributes.name: Estara & Erendel

attributes.content: You don't know them?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Should I?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Very good. I want to ask you about the Sarkaz population here, and about these two children.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: What? You...
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I'll answer your questions.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Gerald! The fire...
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I saw it all. You did well, Raimund.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: And... we meet again, Reverend Executor.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I don't understand.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You were standing there for a long time. I thought you didn't intend to show your face.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Guess there's no hiding from you.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Why did you change your mind?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I believed you did not want to see me again.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Peace makes one timid.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Would you like to pay a visit to our place, Executor?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: We don't have much, but there's a place to sit down, and you can see with your own eyes how the Sarkaz live here.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: As for your questions... I'll do my best to answer them.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I haven't been so active in a long time. I've never been good at pursuit.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: However...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I've got you!
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Bizarre cry)
attributes.name: Twisted Monster

attributes.content: Quiet. This is a residential area. You'll bother the others.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Growls)
attributes.name: Twisted Monster

attributes.content: Eat... hungry...
attributes.name: Twisted Monster

attributes.content: Oh, you can talk? This will be much easier if we can communicate.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Strange roar)
attributes.name: Twisted Monster

attributes.content: I guess it's not that simple.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I'm sorry, but you'll have to stay put. It's dangerous.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I'll contact the Iberian Inquisition. I'm sure they know more about you than I would. If you're really sapient, maybe you can talk to their priests...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Who's that?!
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Stop right there!
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I must ask you to stay.
The night is cut open by a pulse of light.
Lemuen feels a heavy weight that forces her gun down.
The shadow that wields the light stands silently, drawing back the exotic sword before the gun that is slowly pointing towards him.
As the clouds disperse to reveal the moon, Lemuen begins to see who it is.
Well, there have been a lot of unwelcome visitors today.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Can I ask you to stop bothering me? I will be very, very angry if someone gets hurt because we wasted too much time here.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I'm afraid I cannot give way.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: I must ask you not to stop that pitiful soul.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: A noise. Source unclear.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You don't have a lot of people.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: More than you think. Some went out and haven't returned.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: It's getting late. Go back and have some rest.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Are you sure we're leaving tomorrow? Some people haven't come back yet.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: We follow the plan as it is. We set out tomorrow morning.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Senior Federico.
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I'm sleepy...
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: I'm sleepy, and hungry too!
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: Are you gonna take us home?
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: I want to go home... I want Mamma...
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Have gone all day without food?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Mamma never eats. She says she's not hungry.
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: But we haven't eaten today. My tummy hurts.
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: It's so weird.
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: It's not weird. Food is one of the body's basic needs, and being deprived of it leads to discomfort and pain.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Mmm...
attributes.name: Estara & Erendel

attributes.content: That's so complicated!
attributes.name: Estara & Erendel

attributes.content: Is it normal to feel pain if you don't eat?
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: Has Mamma been hurting when she doesn't eat?
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: If what you say is true, yes, your mother has been suffering physical torment.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Enough, Reverend Executor!
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: This is a fact.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Waaaaaahhh...
attributes.name: Estara & Erendel

attributes.content: Uwaaaahh!
attributes.name: Estara & Erendel

attributes.content: Sometimes, the truth is better left unsaid.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: *sniffles*...
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: Is Mamma hurting now?
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: I cannot confirm your mother's current status.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The Executor kneels down. No one pays attention to the dirt on the edge of his robe, and the adornments that represent his status.
Federico Giallo gazes straight into the children's eyes.
I am here as an executor of the Notarial Hall to investigate the truth of what is happening here at the monastery, and to maintain its peace and order.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The disappearance of an inhabitant is within the scope of my mission.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Do you mean...?
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: You'll help us find Mamma?
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Yes, I will find your mother.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Estara & Erendel

attributes.content: Yay!
attributes.name: Estara & Erendel

attributes.content: I never would've thought...
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Will you leave these children in my care for now, Reverend Executor?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I cannot make the decision for them.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Will you go with this young man over here, children?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: But I have to... well, I guess I can do it, now that the sacrarium's all burned up.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: (It's the one even scarier than Senior Federico.)
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: (Yeah, he's so scary...)
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: You two...
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: That will do, Raimund.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: He'll take you kids to supper, then it's off to bed, okay?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: But I want to stay with Senior Federico...
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Sara, Federico's busy! We need to be good.
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: O-Okay, we'll go with the scary guy...
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Hahaha!
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Boss!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: A-Ahem.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Can you get the kids something to eat, then put them to bed?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I can... but where do I take them?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Hyman's house.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Hyman's? I guess there's nobody there right now... but what if Hyman comes back tonight?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: It'll be fine.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Alright, then.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: See you tomorrow, Senior Federico!
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: I hope we find Mamma tomorrow...
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: I will come for you in the morning.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Yay! Good night, Senior Federico.
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: Senior Federico, Senior Federico...
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I-I can't reach you!
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Come down a little lower!
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Hehe...
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: G-Good night!
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Quite the lady's man, aren't you?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Kids these days... what's so great about that guy?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Hey, wait up, you two! Don't run!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: ...Good night.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I thought this was going to be an easy trip, almost like a vacation, welcoming some brethren back to Laterano. It didn't sound hard at all, did it?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Well, I guess I did have to deal with Oren.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: But that wasn't too much of a problem. It's not like you can't talk to him.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Certainly, your skills with a gun can solve many problems.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Not quite enough to deal with you, though.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You flatter me.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: I'm not flattering you... should I call you Father?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You came to protect that... curious visitor of ours, didn't you? I suppose you're from Iberia?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: You wear a cleric's robe, but you feel completely different to believers of the Lateran faith.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You're sharp.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Honest, aren't you?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I won't beat around the bush, then. I don't normally like to be so direct, but...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Not one more step forward. Leave, now.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You are not fit to set foot in Paradise.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I'm afraid I can't comply.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: I am needed here, for a little longer.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: (Tough customer.)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (An unusual sword. The style is Iberian...)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Your attacks are even sharper than your words.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: I still harbor hope for mutual understanding, but I concede that you're acting appropriately, given your position.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: I'm curious, though... how do you define Paradise?
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: A place where everyone lives in peace and happiness.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Preferably with less unwelcome visitors.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Would you call this place Paradise, then?
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: You're enjoying this chit-chat, aren't you?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: A group of people have found peace away from the world for sixty years. What do you call this, if not Paradise?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Even if their lives are endless cold, hunger and suffering?
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: They may be wanting for material comforts... but it's far from endless.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Ah, yes. Laterano will bring salvation. The hard days will soon come to an end.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: At the price of abandoning some.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: ...This isn't anyone's fault.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Please, don't get me wrong. I'm not accusing anyone.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: But I've been thinking: What is the difference between us? Is it physical, or something else?
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: From the individual's very birth, all that makes us who we are causes our thinking to go in divergent ways and reach divergent conclusions...
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Is there really such a thing as mutual understanding within this?
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Are you really going to ask this to a Sankta?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You could try it yourself in your next life, if you happen to become a Sankta.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: ...*cough*!
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (This has taken too long. Can't let that thing attack the residents.)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (I need to take care of this quickly...)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: No need to be anxious. I don't really plan on doing anything.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: I'm here because my kin need help.
attributes.name: Aulus
Lemuen
attributes.content: You sound sincere, but I'm not in a position to trust you.

attributes.name: Lemuen
attributes.content: *cough* *cough*...
*sigh*
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: You're as stubborn as a former student of mine. It can be a virtue, but it can also be trouble.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: I'm curious about a student who could cause you trouble.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: One of the best I've ever had. We never saw each other again, after he left Iberia.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: I didn't want to do this... I'm so getting in trouble for it.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Negotiations failed.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Can't say I regret it.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Lemuen movement is as light as her voice.
She pushes away the movement-aiding device beneath her. The lamp that hung on the handle sways in the night wind, falls, then shatters.
Light leaks out haphazardly, splashing on the silhouette slowly standing up in front.
The dark veil of night is lifted.
You can stand?
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Not yet, really.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Rehabilitation is going to get longer, and I'm going to get scolded.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: *hiss*
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I trust you won't push yourself too hard.
attributes.name: Aulus
Aulus
attributes.content: You're not in good physical shape, nor are you used to this kind of battle—

attributes.name: Aulus
attributes.content: Oh!
Thanks for the compliment. That was aimed for your mouth.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: The people tune out the sermon, when it gets too long.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Especially if they're already fuming after a long and not very good day.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I think I can justify my response based on the provocation.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: The cardinal aide narrows her eyes. The facade of meekness that built up from years of being bedridden falls apart in the sound of her gun being loaded.
Lemuen's light laugh has no warmth in it.
I'm tired. Let's do this quick.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I'll say it again—
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: —Get out of my way, Father.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You may not set foot in Paradise.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Hungry... so hungry...
attributes.name: Twisted Monster

attributes.content: Eat...
attributes.name: Twisted Monster

attributes.content: The thin door plank is pushed open from the outside.
The children are still sleeping.
The cold wind pours into the tiny, battered house through the gap. The unknown threat sneaks in soundlessly, and slowly approaches...
Eat...
attributes.name: Twisted Monster

attributes.content: Hungry... eat, eat...
attributes.name: Twisted Monster

attributes.content: Oh... oh...
attributes.name: Twisted Monster
